policy: High-level periodization of Roman political history for educational overview.

items.title: Roman Kingdom
items.one_liner: Traditional founding through the overthrow of the last king and transition to a republican system.

items.title: Roman Republic
items.one_liner: A republican polity that expanded across the Mediterranean before internal conflicts led to the rise of one-man rule.

items.title: Roman Empire (Principate)
items.one_liner: Early imperial period beginning with Augustus, marked by relative administrative stability and territorial consolidation.
